chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: Katerine Alruddin, p. 27 (15)—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah. Though she keeps it secret, she is actually of the Black Ajah, and has been for twelve years. She was captured by Rand during the battle at Dumai's Wells, but escaped her captors, most likely with assistance from Darkfriends.
